DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , prospective , non-randomized , double-blinded trial evaluate performance CADence device detect existence clinically significant coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation CADence Device Detection Coronary Artery Diseases
DOC.criteria: Subjects clinically indicate nuclear stress test satisfy inclusion exclusion criterion eligible participation . Inclusion criterion : Age 22 year old Willing able give inform consent Clinical indication nuclear stress test evaluation Chest pain syndrome Two coronary artery disease risk factor define : 1 . Dyslipidemia : LDL > 130 mm/dL HDL < 35 mm/dL treatment dyslipidemia 2 . Hypertension : blood pressure > 140 mmHg systolic , > 90 mmHg diastolic blood pressure alter treatment 3 . Obesity : BMI > 28 4 . Current cigarette smoking 5 . Diabetes : Type 1 2 6 . Family history : coronary disease first second degree relative Exclusion criterion : Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 18.5 BMI > 40 Known coronary disease define : Prior bypass surgery coronary stenting Qwave infarction past EKG ( > 0.01 sec Qwave duration two adjacent lead ) Presence pacemaker/defibrillator Presence artificial valve Presence obvious cyanotic prediagnosed congenital heart defect coarctation aorta Presence murmur include valve lesion , ventricular septal defect , AV fistualae . Presence moderate severe valve disease define > 1/6 heart murmur physical diagnosis Left Ventricular Assist Device ( LVAD ) Presence scar site thorax area Participation trial within 30 day prior collect CADenceTM data except participation registry study Asthma wheeze Inability lie flat supine position Acute coronary syndrome elevate cardiac biomarkers ( TP > 3x upper limit normal ( ULN ) CKMB > 3x ULN ) Heart Transplant Current cocaine use ( within past 24 hour , report subject ) Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) Contraindication CT angiography Renal failure GFR < 50 ( angio risk ) Iodinated contrast allergy Elevated heart rate control sufficiently achieve good CT angiogram Body weight > 350lbs . Sinus rhythm rate great 100 beat per minute screening . Atrial fibrillation average heart rate great 70 beat per minute rest screen ECG .
